    • registerPath

      public boolean registerPath​(double dblLatitudeA, double dblLongitudeA, double dblLatitudeB, double dblLongitudeB, java.lang.String strName, double dblWindSpeed, double dblWindAngle, double dblKineticFrictionCoefficient, VehicleType oVehicleType)
      Registers a new Path basing on the atributes given by parameter
      Parameters:
      dblLatitudeA - Address Latitude
      dblLongitudeA - Address Longitude
      dblLatitudeB - Other Address latitude
      dblLongitudeB - Other Address longitude
      strName - Path name
      dblWindSpeed - Path wind speed
      dblWindAngle - Path wind angle
      dblKineticFrictionCoefficient - Path kinetic friction coefficient
      oVehicleType - Path Vehicle Type
      Returns:
      True if the Path was registered, false if otherwise
